Constructor Details

# (void) constructor(message = 'Exception thrown', level, htmlMessage, toString)

Class constructor

Parameters:

  • message ( String ) — Message (title) to display, default is 'Exception thrown'
  • level ( String ) — Level of the exception
  • htmlMessage ( String ) — HTML message to display
  • toString ( String ) — The to String value of the exception (from the stack trace)
